name: Amendium
description:
Join Axel and Lance in a full-scale quest to discover what happened to the planet they find themselves on. Journey through 3 seas and into many dungeons in search of answers as both Axel and Lance. Swap seamlesssly between third person swordfighting and first person hero shooting to solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and discover secrets.
There's plenty to do! Soar around in Axel and Lance's ship, grind to buy better weapons, or venture to the mini game hub for multiplayer party games for up to 4 players. The world of Amendium offers many adventures.
